title: You've been disconnected from Chat. [Constantly]
body:
Past couple of weeks I'm having a strange disconnect from the chat issue. It's like every 2-3 minutes and my girlfriend gets it too with her laptop (connected to the same network, I'm with cable and she's with Wifi).
I'm guessing the problem is with my modem or something like that but I have no idea how to fix this. I'm making this threat because I'm sure that I'm not the first who faces a problem like this and probably there is a fix out there I'm not aware of.

[Screenshot 1](http://i.imgur.com/9eSSeQi.png)
[Screenshot 2](http://i.imgur.com/ZP227fn.png)

- I already have disabled the IP Helper (old threats suggested this).
- I don't have disconnect issues with any other game.
- I have a netgear modem (if this is important in any possible way).
- I don't have disconnects issues with my girlfriends laptop when I'm connected to other wifi networks.

Thank you very much guys, I appreciate any help.
George

replies.body: Having same problem form patch 7.14 update...riot need to fix this problem as soon as possible
It happens to me to please help me

I now have the same issues since some days. I tried on different networks and get kicks everywhere, i was already canceled from some games because of an annoying discon in the wrong moment.
Also already diabled IP helper
im having the same issue, its not my network it's happened at my old house and my new one, different internet providers. new computer. so no this isnt a network issue.

If you're seeing this issue only on your network and not on others, then it's pretty safe to say it's probably an error somewhere in your network.

I'd take a look at our [Connection Troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), specifically the [Firewall](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3) and [Port Forwarding](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq8) sections.  Should help to give a starting point in identify where/what the problem could be (router, packet loss, firewall, etc.) Lemme know if this helps!
i am also having the same issue
hi, ye try going to firewall settings in the setup of you mac or pc and change the netowrk setting for the java to let network connection in.
